column4: anyone familiar with the ubuntu breezy RC... I'm having issues with any apt-getting because of evolution-exchange package missing a "newline"
can anyone help me with this apt error?  http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/2954
you are a victim of bad packaging
what can I do?
this was the RC of breezy :\
i did
then d/l a newer daily http://cdimage.ubuntu.com
or apt-get update
yes please research at bugzilla.ubuntu.com and either add it or comment it
np
please dont advise permission changes on directories not owned by the user
it was owned by him.. he chowned it
i didnt see the directory involved , which one was it?
no no. Skullb0x has a fstab issue, not a permission issue
got me ;)  i didn't ask... i am guessing his/her usb drive is formatted NTFS rather than anything else
changing the perms in /media/* won't work
it works temporarily
no it doesnt, cuz the mounted drive still has been mounted with no-entry perms
possibly... but not necessarily... could just be the mount point itself is b0rkd
usually problems in /media/ or /mnt/ are in the fstab, not system perms
very true... i'll say it... you're right, i'm wrong ;)
it's not about being right, using "chmod" on those dirs can damage the box
i hear ya
